import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Card, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FaDollarSign } from 'react-icons/fa' import Rating from '../Rating' import products from '../../products' const ProductScreen = ({match, history, location}) => { const {image, name, rating, numReviews, price, description, status} = products.find(({_id}) => _id === match.params.id); console.log(match.params.id); return ( <>

{name}
Price: {price}
 Description: {description} Price: {price} Price: {price} Morbi leo risus ) } export default ProductScreen
